price: 83. (Y Abraham rogó a Al-lah diciendo:) «¡Señor, concédeme sabiduría e inclúyeme entre los rectos y virtuosos!
arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: rabbi hab lī ḥuk'man wa-alḥiq'nī bil-ṣāliḥīna
